collection:
This Privacy Policy document contains types of
information that is collected and recorded by Voice Models and how we use it.

The information collected by log files include
internet protocol (IP) addresses, browser type, Internet Service Provider
(ISP), date and time stamp, referring/exit pages, and possibly the number of
clicks.

These cookies are used to
store information including visitors' preferences, and the pages on the
website that the visitor accessed or visited.
They automatically receive your IP address when this occurs.

Voice Models does not knowingly collect any Personal Identifiable Information
from children under the age of 13.

This policy is not applicable to any
information collected offline or via channels other than this website.
